Entries.230201073/A cc_Bus/f Goldenglow 1000/p G: none/9 18/farmer -100 -100 0 Gus 12 18 2 Goldenglow 14 17 0 Pam 7 18 1/skippable/pause 1000/speak Pam "Umm...little Susie, another drink!"/pause 500/faceDirection Goldenglow 3/emote Goldenglow 28/move Goldenglow -5 0 2/move Goldenglow 0 1 3/speak Goldenglow "Pam! This is already the fourth cup, how long are you going to drink! $5#$b# Moreover, you always buy on credit, which will really make our bar operation more difficult.$5"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Even so, please think about your family and your health...$10"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "What Little Susie said is indeed reasonable, and you really shouldn't drink like this anymore..."/pause 500/emote Pam 28/pause 500/speak Pam "......$2#$b#*hiccups* But...$2"/pause 500/speak Pam "But... I don't know what I should do...$2#$b# Maybe I can only remain depressed like this...$2"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 40/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Pam, what a joke! What's the point of pure self-deception?! $5#$b# You can't go on like this, think about your daughter Penny! $5"/pause 250/speak Goldenglow "She lives such a fulfilling life, but you keep draining her. Are you doing this to her? !$5"/pause 500/emote Gus 40/emote Pam 28/pause 500/speak Gus "well...$2"/pause 500/warp farmer 14 24/move farmer 0 -3 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Gus 2/pause 500/speak Gus "Hmm? @, do you need anything?"/pause 250/question fork0 "#What's wrong with you?"/speak Gus "Well... it's like this..."/emote Gus 40/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/pause 500/question fork0 "#Um...Pam, I think you should find a job. You shouldn't continue like this. It's not good for everyone, including yourself! #......#Hmm? I don't really want to get involved in this matter..."/fork answerPam/pause 500/emote Pam 28/pause 500/speak Pam "...Well, since you said so too...I'll think of a way...$2"/pause 500/faceDirection Goldenglow 2/pause 200/emote Goldenglow 32/pause 500/end

Entries.230201074/f Goldenglow 500: none/11 13/farmer 8 14 1 Goldenglow 11 9 2/skippable/animate Goldenglow false true 50 21/pause 1000/move farmer 3 0 1/animate Goldenglow false true 50 0/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Hi, @, you are here."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/speak Goldenglow "Well...$8"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "You know, I always accidentally shock my friends sometimes, and it really affects my life...$7"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "My friend there told me that studying this book would greatly improve my current situation...$12"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "$q 1 null#......#$r 1 0 event_archaeology_1#what book?#$r 1 0 event_archaeology_2#......#$r 2 0 event_archaeology_2#Um?"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "It may sound a bit complicated. Some of these things are of interest to me, but more importantly, it helps me to better control my own unconscious electric current."/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/speak Goldenglow "Um?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak Goldenglow "......$10#$b#After all, I always accidentally shock my friends...$12"/pause 1000/speak Goldenglow "Well...$2"/question fork1 "#This is true. I hope you can improve this situation soon.#......"/fork asnwersixdian/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Well, thank you for your concern. I also hope to master it as soon as possible. It has a great impact on me."/speak Goldenglow "Anyway, you go ahead and get busy. See you next time!$1"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.asnwersixdian: pause 100/speak Goldenglow "Boring? Okay, I understand...$2"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 12/pause 1000/speak Goldenglow "Anyway, you go ahead and do your work. See you next time."/pause 1000/end

Entries.230201075/f Goldenglow 2000/D Goldenglow: none/87 40/farmer 87 36 2 Goldenglow 88 40 2/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 0 4 2/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "$q 1 null#......#$r 1 0 event_beach_1#What are you doing here?#$r 1 0 event_beach_1#It’s so late, why don’t you go home?"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 28/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Um...$2#$b# Thinking of some things in the past, I feel a little bad...$2"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Um...so I want to stay here for a while...$8"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Um...$12#$b#@, before coming here, I saw too much misfortune...$7"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Although life is hard and many people are seriously ill and have little time left, $8#$b# but everyone is always so positive in living."/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "en......$12#$b#But I don’t know how those friends are doing now after so much time has passed?$8"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 40/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "@.$12#$b#I think death does not mean the disappearance of a person.$8"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "When there is no one in this world who knows him/her anymore, then he/she truly ceases to exist.$7"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "I think I will always remember those people and those things.$8"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 28/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "so……$12"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "@.$12#$b#Even though you may not see me in the future, please don't forget me....$10"/question fork1 "#Will not.#......"/fork asnwersixdian1/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "唔...$4"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 20/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Well...I think no matter what, we should cherish the present."/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Well, thank you for talking to me so much tonight. #$b# I think it's getting late, I'm a little sleepy, you should go back and rest early too."/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.asnwersixdian1: pause 100/speak Goldenglow "......$2"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 24/pause 1000/speak Goldenglow "Well... I think it’s getting late and I’m a little sleepy. You should go back and rest early too."/pause 1000/end

Entries.230201076/f Goldenglow 1500/t 1000 1800/: none/57 33/farmer 50 34 1 Goldenglow 57 33 1/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 4 0 1/pause 250/faceDirection Goldenglow 3/pause 250/speak Goldenglow "Hi, @, see you again.$9"/pause 200/speak Goldenglow "$q 1 null#......#$r 1 0 event_mountain_1#The weather is really nice today.#$r 1 0 event_mountain_2#在干什么呢？#$r 1 0 event_mountain_3#......"/pause 150/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 250/faceDirection Goldenglow 1/pause 300/emote farmer 56/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 40/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Hmm...$8#$b#After staying in Stardew Valley for a long time, I sometimes miss my past life.$12"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "But to be honest, living here really makes me feel comfortable."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "$q 1 null#Um?#$r 1 0 event_mountain_4#Do you still miss the place where you used to live?#$r 1 0 event_mountain_5#Life there must be difficult..."/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "But as the old saying goes: #$b# Wherever my heart is, that’s my home. @, isn’t it?$1"/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "And there, I was pretty much the same as I am now, still helping out in the bar..."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Um......$8"/pause 500/question fork1 "#And then? #That's pretty good too."/fork asnwerbucuo/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Well... let's forget about the rest, they are all bad memories. $7#$b# But don't worry, everything will be fine."/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "I won't be stuck in this memory forever. #$b#At least the life in Stardew Valley and the friends here won't make me feel lost. $1"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 56/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Um...$8#$b#Anyway, @, I'm glad to know a friend like you.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Then you go ahead and do your work. See you next time.$9"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.asnwerbucuo: pause 100/speak Goldenglow "Yeah, that’s true."/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 56/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Anyway, @, it's nice to meet a friend like you.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Goldenglow "Then you go ahead and do your work. See you next time.$9"/pause 500/emote Goldenglow 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.Goldenglow4heart: Dear @: ^Hello! ^It's been a while since I met you. Thank you for being so kind to me. ^At present, I am just helping Gus, the boss, in the bar. I don't have anything valuable to give you in return, but I think the thought is the most important. ^This is a bottle of fruit wine that I carefully selected in the bar. I hope you like it. ^^-Susie%item id (O)348 1 %%[#]A gift from Susie

Entries.Goldenglow9heart: To @: ^Nice to meet you, @! ^Few people in my past and present life have cared so much about me. ^I am glad that we can enter each other's world, @. ^I wish you peace and happiness! ^^-Love you Susie [#] Letter from Susie
